tool_description: Evaluates the quality, appropriateness, and compliance of generated responses before publication, checking for tone consistency, accuracy, and potential issues.

generated_response.description: The generated response text to evaluate

original_review.description: Original customer review being responded to

expected_sentiment.description: Expected response sentiment: positive, negative, neutral

business_guidelines.description: Specific business communication guidelines to check against

check_length.description: Whether to check response length appropriateness

error_messages: Empty response text: Provide non-empty generated_response parameter for quality checking.
Empty original review: Provide non-empty original_review parameter for context evaluation.
Invalid expected sentiment: Use one of [positive, negative, neutral].
Response too long: Generated response exceeds maximum recommended length for platform.
usage: Provide generated_response, original_review, and expected_sentiment parameters. Optionally include business_guidelines array for compliance checking. Enable check_tone and check_length for comprehensive quality evaluation.

context_relevance.description: How well response addresses the original review (0-1 scale)

potential_issues.description: Identified potential issues or concerns with the response

improvement_suggestions.description: Specific suggestions for improving the response
